item.title: Trump says U.S. will 'take over' Gaza to develop it, and Palestinians should leave

item.title: Trump's trade war could have a clear winner: The UK
item.description: Britain's economy could get a major boost if the country remains on the sidelines of Trump's trade war.

item.title: Senate confirms Trump's nominee Pam Bondi as attorney general

item.title: Watch Trump's full remarks on Gaza with Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu
item.description: The Israeli prime minister's visit came as negotiators in the Middle East begin talks in earnest about a second phase to the Gaza ceasefire.

item.title: Trump administration sued over FBI Jan. 6 questionnaires, FDA clinical data removal
item.description: One lawsuit accuses the DOJ of compiling retaliation lists. Another claims the CDC and other agencies deleted medical data that doctors relied upon.
